This file contains the code used for machine learning



Please run machine_learning.py directly. It contains all the machine learning source code.



Relevant dataset file Have a total.csv file ready, as shown below, where each row represents a set of data with the coordinates of 14 points and the corresponding flatness
x1,x2,x3,x4,x5,x6,x7,x8,x9,x10,x11,x12,x13,x14,y1,y2,y3,y4,y5,y6,y7,y8,y9,y10,y11,y12,y13,y14,z1,z2,z3,z4,z5,z6,z7,z8,z9,z10,z11,z12,z13,z14,flatNess
80.3,38.1,9.9,0,9.9,38.1,80.3,179.7,221.9,250.1,260,250.1,221.9,179.7,250.1,221.9,179.7,130,80.3,38.1,9.9,250.1,221.9,179.7,130,80.3,38.1,9.9,3.868409999999999904e+00,4.876249999999999751e+00,4.893189999999999706e+00,5.009310000000000151e+00,5.612180000000000391e+00,5.412899999999999601e+00,4.952239999999999753e+00,3.871919999999999806e+00,4.870759999999999756e+00,4.894409999999999705e+00,5.005040000000000155e+00,5.613559999999999661e+00,5.413210000000000299e+00,4.952549999999999564e+00,4.757042649340444740e+00



这个文件包含了关于机器学习所使用的代码

请直接运行machine_learning.py这个文件，内部包含了所有的相关的机器学习的源代码。

相关的数据集文件请准备好一个total.csv文件，如下所示，每一行表示一组数据，包含14个点的坐标和对应的平面度
x1,x2,x3,x4,x5,x6,x7,x8,x9,x10,x11,x12,x13,x14,y1,y2,y3,y4,y5,y6,y7,y8,y9,y10,y11,y12,y13,y14,z1,z2,z3,z4,z5,z6,z7,z8,z9,z10,z11,z12,z13,z14,flatNess
80.3,38.1,9.9,0,9.9,38.1,80.3,179.7,221.9,250.1,260,250.1,221.9,179.7,250.1,221.9,179.7,130,80.3,38.1,9.9,250.1,221.9,179.7,130,80.3,38.1,9.9,3.868409999999999904e+00,4.876249999999999751e+00,4.893189999999999706e+00,5.009310000000000151e+00,5.612180000000000391e+00,5.412899999999999601e+00,4.952239999999999753e+00,3.871919999999999806e+00,4.870759999999999756e+00,4.894409999999999705e+00,5.005040000000000155e+00,5.613559999999999661e+00,5.413210000000000299e+00,4.952549999999999564e+00,4.757042649340444740e+00
